show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Ellen Kamhi, PhD, RN, AHG, AHN-BC interviews Dr Holly Lucille, ND.   Dr. Holly Lucille, a.k.a. “Dr. Holly,” is a nationally recognized and licensed practicing naturopathic doctor, and television & radio host.
An acclaimed expert in the field of integrative medicine, Dr Holly lectures throughout the nation on natural health topics.
On todays show, they will discuss Dr Holly’s book, The Healing Power of Trauma Comfrey, about how comfrey offers a safe, effective and simple way to address, sprains, strains, wounds, and back pain.
 For hundreds of years, no Materia Medica was complete without detailed instructions on how to use comfrey, and medical journals carried stories of near-miraculous healings.
In this book, Dr Holly introduces modern audiences to the old time traditional remedy.   Contact:www.drHollyLucille.com   www.facebook.com/drHollyLucille
